cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to -1 (negative value) will cause configuration validation failure as gNB_ID must be non-negative.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to 100 (exceeds maximum allowed power) will cause configuration validation failure in the SSB power configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為 100（超過最大允許功率）會在 SSB 功率配置中導致配置驗證失敗。
